prompts: Close-up of rows of sunflowers of the same size facing front and swaying gently in the breeze; with one in the center
Zooms in on a single front-facing sunflower in the center at the field's edge
Closer view of the sunflower in the center. Emphasize the sunflower's golden petals and the intricate details
